sql.where:
AND 1 = 1
AND NAME like '%' || #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
SELECT t.*,@rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( SELECT @rownum := 0, t1.ID AS id, t1.USER_NAME AS userName, t1.TRUE_NAME AS trueName, t1.PASS_WORD AS password, t1.QUESTION1 AS question1, t1.ANSWER1 AS answer1, t1.QUESTION2 AS question2, t1.ANSWER2 AS answer2, t2.COMPANY_NAME AS companyName, t1.TELPHONE AS telphone, t1.COMPANY_ID AS companyId, DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATE_DATE,'%y-%m-%d %T 24') AS createDateStr, t1.STATUS AS status FROM BUS_USER t1,BUS_COMPANY t2 WHERE t1.COMPANY_ID = t2.ID
AND t1.USER_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{userName},'%')
AND t1.TRUE_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{trueName},'%')
AND t2.COMPANY_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{companyName},'%')
AND t1.STATUS LIKE concat('%',#{status},'%')
) t
LIMIT #{begin},#{end}

mapper.delete: DELETE t.* FROM BUS_USER t WHERE t.ID = #{id}
